method.text: Lightly grease or butter individual moulds or a 900 ml ovenproof basin. Spoon the marmalade evenly into the bases of the moulds or basin.
Cream the butter and sugar together until pale and fluffy. Beat in the eggs slowly. Fold in the flour with a metal spoon until evenly mixed.
Divide the mixture evenly between the moulds or fill the basin and cover with a piece of pleated foil.
Steam the small puddings for about 40-50 min or the large one for 1 <sup>1</sup>/<sub>1</sub> days or until well risen.
